articles.description: Stop the presses because this is probably the first video of the C8 Corvette ZR1, induction and exhaust sounds included! As the headline implies, the C8 Corvette Z06 is also featured in the following clip.

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Valorant review: A must-play shooter that’s just getting started - Polygon
articles.description: Riot Games has finally released a new, competitive multiplayer game. Valorant borrows ideas from just about every game that came before, only to remind us that execution matters much more than originality. Read our full review right here.
articles.content:
Few games have ever been as focused as Valorant, the new free-to-play, competitive first-person shooter from Riot Games. 
The company has wisely decided to shove just about everything that isnt the … [+14457 chars]
